description: Hibs may lose Doig money - gossip
title: Hibs may lose Doig money - gossip
title_page: Hibs may lose Doig money - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hibernian could miss out on Â£1.4m if Josh Doig joins Torino from Hellas Verona in a swap deal rather than a transfer, which could negate the 27.5% sell-on clause the Edinburgh club inserted in his deal last summer. (Football Scotland)
Read the rest of Tuesday's gossip.
